metadata.title: CVE-2021-41800 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: MediaWiki before 1.36.2 allows a denial of service (resource consumptionbecause of lengthy query processing time). Visiting Special:Contributionscan sometimes result in a long running SQL query because PoolCounterprotection is mishandled.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
